*** We accept Master Card
Lines 1210-1280 store a NOP and a JMP $0000 at the end of RAM. Lines 1320-1350 store $99 into $9900-$9999
Lines 1170-1290 fill RAM from $200-$BFFF with $48's, which are "PHA" opcodes. Lines 1300-1330 do the same with page zero
